note: Professor of Political Communication at Loughborough University. Editor-in-Chief of the International Journal of Press/Politics. Director of the Centre for Research in Communication and Culture. Coauthor of "Outside the Bubble: Social Media and Political Participation in Western Democracies" (OUP, 2021).
